channel.title: Need help!
channel.description:
ok i wanted to have a code to give scythe a spec that leaves enemy with just 1 hp and make it so when u equip the scythe u become the reaper and i want the whip to turn u into a abby demon can any1 plz help me out with this ty!!! :) :)
EDIT:i also wanted a code that is like ::adminpkon or something that makes it so when a owner or admin uses it they can attack any1 outside of wildy and anywhere they want but mainly for owners...
